title: Data Sovereignty
description: Maintain complete control over your data with personal data stores. Your information never leaves your secure environment while contributing to AI advancement.

title: Collaborative AI
description: Participate in decentralized AI training without sharing raw data. Only model updates are shared, keeping your data within your personal data store.

title: Fair Rewards
description: Earn cryptographic rewards through a trustless mechanism on a public blockchain. Benefit financially from on-device AI training with fair, decentralized distribution.
